subject: Invoice for Corban Atkins
body:
Hello Kay Atkins,

Here is the invoice for the work you have recieved.

Summary

Attached to this email should be 1 invoice for 1 job (Corban Atkins): for a total of $40.00.

Specific Note

So, I should have sent this before I saw you yesterday. You should get a receipt for the payment you made, also. Your current balance is $12

Details


Corban Atkins: 1 invoice totaling $40.00


Invoice #48 for $40.00


As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $12.00



Thank You,
Greg Goad Music Instruction

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.

Contact Information

Telephone: 336-406-1319
